headline: NiSource to Release Full-Year 2025 Financial Results and Host Conference Call on February 11
summary: MERRILLVILLE, Ind., January 28, 2026--NiSource Inc. (NYSE: NI) today announced that the company will release full-year 2025 financial results on Feb. 11, 2026, before U.S. financial markets open and will host a conference call that day at 11 a.m. EST (10 a.m. CST) to review full-year 2025 financial results and provide a general business update. All interested parties may listen to the conference call live on Feb. 11 by logging onto the NiSource website at www.nisource.com. A link on the home pag
